activities: Bluestone Services International LLC DBA Bluestone Recoveries International ("BRI") is an international professional services company, with clients and agents in EU countries providing global commercial, trade, and consumer debt recovery as well as auditing and legal services to private and publicly traded businesses.  We receive and utilize personal information from our clients and agents in EU countries to provide debt recovery, auditing and legal services to clients.
